channel.title: Scrapbook
channel.description: This page will hold my Ethical Scrapbook, chronicling events which have occured in today’s world which affect ethics in technology.

item.title: The Internet Black Hole That Is North Korea
item.description: Summary: This article discusses the complete lack of Internet in the country of North Korea. The government bans most forms of free communication, and internet is nonexistant in the country. Reason
